title: Make Layout of Admin UI a bit more liquid
description:
Magnus Bergmark mentioned in SOLR-4079 that on a large screen (common or not ) the layout is a bit odd, because the sidebar has a fixed with of 150px and therefore only the content area grows on the screen.

if possible, we should use percentage values also for this (already done for some other areas of the layouts) so that it's really flexible and uses provided screen width
